body.name: MONTECH King 95 PRO Dual-Chamber ATX Mid-Tower PC Gaming Case, High-Airflow, Toolless Panels, Sturdy Curved Tempered Glass Front, Six ARGB PWM Fan Pre-Installed with Fan Hub, King 95 PRO Blue US
features: 1. Curved Glass Elegance: Immerse yourself beyond flat screens with KING 95's 4mm Industrial-Grade Curved Tempered Glass. Experience optimal curvature and unmatched durability, providing crystal-clear component visibility from every angle.

2. Exceptional Compatibility: Dual Chamber design tailored for the mightiest 40 series graphics cards. Purpose-built to house 8 hard drives, dual power supplies, and flagship 4090 graphics cards, it features over 35mm of cable management space.

3. Innovative Cooling Design: Features a patented adjustable side fan bracket for enhanced airflow, allowing rotation to the front. This unique design provides a perfect balance between cooling performance and aesthetics, offering unmatched personalization options.

4. Cooling Versatility: Provides adaptability for total comfort with diverse cooling options. Enjoy a 360mm top radiator, the 280mm with 240mm (up to 60mm thickness) without interference, and up to 175mm air cooler height.
5. Building Bliss: Delivers unprecedented enjoyment in PC buildings with quick-release glass panels, a spacious interior, and hassle-free assembly for clean cable management.
body.description: 1. Beyond Flat Screens: The Allure of Curved Glass Experiences Elevate Your Viewing Experience with Curved Glass Elegance - After a year of rigorous testing, KING 95's Industrial-Grade Curved Tempered Glass boasts optimal curvature and unmatched durability, ensuring crystal-clear component visibility from every angle. 2. Cooling Options Galore: Liquid, Air, and Fan-Friendly Adaptability Meets Your Choices for Total Comfort - KING 95 offers versatile cooling, supporting a 360mm top radiator, 240mm side radiator (up to 60mm thickness) without any interference, and up to 175mm air cooler height for flexible component customization. 3. Innovation in Every Frame: Our Patented Side Fan Bracket Unique side fan mounting design for improved airflow - KING 95 introduces a patented adjustable side fan bracket that can be rotated to the front for improved airflow. This design offers versatility for both cooling performance and aesthetics, providing unmatched personalization options. 4. Dynamic Duo Airflow Modes Elegant Glass Mode- Achieves efficient case cooling with side and bottom air intake, seamlessly blending function and aesthetics. Turbo Mesh Mode- Utilizing a 3-directional cooling, it efficiently draws in air from the front, side, and bottom while expelling heat through the top and rear, ensuring rapid and effective cooling. 5. Safeguard with Style: The 0.8mm Fortress Discover the ultimate in durability with the KING 95, crafted from 0.8mm-thick metal for a sleek design that ensures sturdy protection. 6. Masterpiece Unleashed: The Zenith of Premium Series A Symphony of Luxury: Discovering the Zenith in KING 95 - Step into the future with Montech's KING Series – the epitome of premium materials and cutting-edge design. KING is the result of our relentless pursuit of quality and innovation, seamlessly blending top-tier materials with distinctive aesthetics. Whether you're a trend-setting gamer or a visionary creator striving for excellence, KING Series is designed to meet and exceed your every tech component desire. This collection embodies our unyielding commitment to excellence. KING 95, our flagship product, stands as a symbol of our unwavering dedication to quality. With its captivating exterior design and groundbreaking features, KING Series promises to immerse you in a world of tech-driven excitement. 7. Beyond Flat Screens: The Allure of Curved Glass Experiences Elevate Your Viewing Experience with Curved Glass Elegance - After a year of rigorous testing, KING 95's Industrial-Grade Curved Tempered Glass boasts optimal curvature and unmatched durability, ensuring crystal-clear component visibility from every angle. 8. Unleash the Power of Resilience: Unwavering Tempered Glass Breaking Barriers, Not Glass: The Odyssey of Unwavering Tempered Resilience - The KING 95 case's glass is meticulously crafted from industrial-grade 4mm tempered glass, known for its exceptional strength, durability, scratch resistance, and impact resilience. 9. Aesthetic ARGB Lighting Transform your space with mesmerizing Addressable RGB lighting - KING 95 features a seamlessly integrated front panel light strip with a curved design, offering a variety of built-in lighting modes, allowing the creation of stunning artistic effects. 10. Hardware Harmony with Dual Chamber: Exceptional Compatibility Designed to accommodate the mightiest 40 series graphics cards - KING 95's dual-chamber is designed to accommodate 8 hard drives, dual power supplies, and flagship 4090 graphics cards. It offers over 35mm of cable management space, optimizing cooling and providing robust hardware support. 11. Building Bliss: A Symphony of PC Building Unprecedented Enjoyment in Building - KING 95 offers quick-release glass panels and a spacious interior for clean cable management, featuring a hassle-free assembly. 12. Fortress of Cleanliness: Defend Your PC with Built-in Filters Sentinels of Clarity: Defend Your PC with Embedded Filters - KING 95 features easily removable top, side, and bottom panels, each equipped with dedicated dust filters. This meticulous design ensures that your build maintains its polished and uncluttered appearance. 13. Every Shade Tells a Story: Your Choice of Four Every Hue, Every Story: Discover Your Fourfold Palette - KING 95 dazzles with four captivating color options, allowing you to transform your build into a true masterpiece. Choose from Gentleman Black, Pure White, Vibrant Red, or Prussian Blue.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 7 ratings 4.1 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Allure of Curved Glass Experiences Immerse yourself beyond flat screens with KING 95's 4mm Industrial-Grade Curved Tempered Glass. Experience optimal curvature and unmatched durability, providing crystal-clear component visibility from every angle.

Dynamic Duo Airflow Modes Elegant Glass Mode: Efficient case cooling with sleek side and bottom air intake for a seamless blend of function and aesthetics. Turbo Mesh Mode: Effective 3-directional cooling, draws in air from front, side, and bottom, expelling heat through top and rear.

Ultimate Fan Support Designed with support for up to 7, 120mm fans at the top, bottom, and rear, you can ensure optimal airflow for superior cooling. The fan bracket is equipped to handle 2 140mm fans, and the side panel adds even more cooling capacity with support for 2 additional 140mm fans. In total, enjoy the power of 11 fans to keep your system running smoothly. Cooling Versatility Experience advanced cooling possibilities with our PC case featuring a spacious design to accommodate a 360mm top radiator and a side radiator of up to 240mm with a thickness of up to 60mm, all without any interference. Modern Aesthetic Fans Elevate your setup with our PC accessory that seamlessly integrates a stunning total of 24 LEDs. The hexagonal RGB ring on the frame not only enhances the visual appeal but takes design aesthetics to a whole new level. Safeguard with Style: The 0.8mm Fortress Discover the ultimate in durability with the KING 95, crafted from 0.8mm-thick metal for a sleek design that ensures sturdy protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very spacious! Very affordable! Great bang for buck
reviews.reviewText: Very spacious! Very affordable! Great bang for buck!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice case, moved everything from a Thermal Take H200, lotsa room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Manual needs work
reviews.reviewText: This is an aquarium of a case. It's great and comes with a screw case that labels what is for what and has cable ties and velcro cable management straps (already some in case)The manual is very ambiguous but after a long while with the pages you can kind of figure it out.It has a 3pin argb connector so you'll need a 4pin adapter for some mobos,Never used rgb in computers so it's a bit of a hassle for me with the fans.Other than above mentions, it's pretty solid for a case, with the 1st ground up build, I'm looking forward to my overkill case for years to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality control. Just a bad experience
reviews.reviewText: It was apparently assembled before the paint was dry, because when I removed screws, paint came with them.The movable fan cage was difficult to move. I was trying to install an AIO, but it would not go back into place on the back of the case. Again, this seems to have been caused by it being assembled before the paint was dry.I should have known this was going to be a problem when I took it out of the box, and found that the cable cover door was not there. They apparently forgot to put it on.This was just a bad experience, and I would avoid at all costs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING looking case!!!
reviews.reviewText: WOW!!! I love this case! Saw a video on YouTube, and I said "THAT IS THE ONE!!" Love how the class slopes on the front. A true work of art. This thing is HEAVY!! It is not cheaply built. I had an NZXT Phantom full tower before this, which is a good case, but this thing blows it out of the water!! The PRO version comes with the LED controller and 6 fans. Regular version does not. I am old (56) and never thought I would get all the lights, as I said it is for kids, but now that I have it, WOW! WARNING: If you are older, GET THE WHITE VERSION!!! I got the black, and now that I got it together, I do not regret it, but what should have taken an hour or two, took me TWO DAYS!!!! This thing is MIDNIGHT BLACK, and it is really hard on aging eyes (and arthritis) to get the black screws and connectors into a pitch black case. It is truly a thing of beauty once you do get it together though. Fans are SILENT!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for an Amazing CASE
reviews.reviewText: This thing is stunning! Shows off my computer components perfectly. The RGB accents my motherboard, RAM, and GPU's RGB as well. The giant glass panels shows off my build and is quite the show piece. There is enough ventilation for my AIO and tons of room to build and run cables. Would definitely recommend this case for anyone looking for their next build
